jobsJson.text: Jr. Data Scientist, Financial Services Platform
jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
At Gojek’s Financial Services Platform Team, we wake up thinking about better ways to expand access to savings, insurance, loans, and investments to all Indonesians. We build financial products with partners and deploy at scale to our hundreds of thousands of GoFood merchants, 1 million+GoRide/GoCar drivers, tens of millions of users. We’re looking for talented new colleagues to join us on our mission of universal access to financial services.

Data Science Team: 
Our team is in charge of building various predictive models that help Go-Jek drivers, merchants, and customers. We use models to predict churn, to credit score loan applicants, and pricing and adoption models. We are a growing team and quickly expand our capabilities and add more models that we support. We are focused on growth and efficiency. We are all about open knowledge share and self-improvement. We believe that “Data Science is a team sport.”

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Data Exploration: Research different data sources, Assess data usefulness for the algorithm teams, Measure data quality, stability, and reliability)
  • Data Cleanup: Provide data cleanup solutions, Design imputation techniques
  • ETL Code Design: Design and production code based on the results of data exploration and cleanup, Support algorithms and data team with their ETL needs
  • Reporting: Address any data-related questions from internal or external stakeholders, Data deep dives and ad-hoc requests, Support algorithms team with their reporting tasks
  • Other: Slowly, we will introduce you to statistical models and advance analytics, Slowly, you will pick up engineering skills, Slowly, you will contribute to the team’s ML knowledge by presenting on the latest developments in the industry

• Position is in Jakarta (Indonesia)
  • Ability to clearly and precisely communicate in English
  • Able to independently execute deep dives into data sources, present results, and propose recommendations in a clear and concise way
  • Min. 1-year experience in performing analytics using structured and unstructured data
  • Solid conceptual understanding of methods in analytics and some basic for data science
  • Solid SQL skills, comfortable with Python/R, and really good dashboarding/visualization skills
  • Experience working with big data and complex data structures
